title: Reanimation
verses:
1. And will the Judge descend? And must the dead arise?
And not a single soul escape His all discerning eyes! His all discerning eyes!

2. How will my heart endure
The terrors of that day,
When earth and heaven before his face,
Astonished, shrink away?

3. But ere the trumpet shakes
The mansions of the dead,
Hark! from the gospel's cheering sound
What joyful tidings spread!

4. Ye sinners, see his grace,
Whose wrath ye cannot bear;
Flee to the shelter of his cross,
And find salvation there

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Focuses on the resurrection of the dead and final judgment, contrasting divine wrath with available grace and salvation through Christ's cross
